meanings.sent1: The undelivered package was still sitting on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The undelivered letter was returned to the sender.
meanings.sent3: The undelivered pizza left everyone hungry and disappointed.
meanings.sent4: His undelivered promises weighed heavily on her mind.
meanings.sent5: The undelivered message left a sense of anticipation in the air.

meanings.sent1: The undelivered keys were found in the lost and found.
meanings.sent2: The undelivered report needed to be completed by the deadline.
meanings.sent3: His undelivered handshake left the deal incomplete.
meanings.sent4: The undelivered contract caused confusion between the parties.
meanings.sent5: The undelivered gift remained a mystery to the recipient.

meanings.definition: Not sent to the intended recipient
meanings.sent1: The undelivered email was stuck in the outbox.
meanings.sent2: The undelivered package was mistakenly sent to the wrong address.
meanings.sent3: The undelivered invitation led to a mix-up in the guest list.
meanings.sent4: Her undelivered message of love lingered in her heart.
meanings.sent5: The undelivered parcel waited patiently for redirection.
